entry.title: 3M AM24774 - 3M Cubitron II Cut-Off Wheel, 66526, T1, black, 5 in x 0.05 in x 7/8 in (12.70 cm x 1.27 mm) AM24774 7100024774
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 4.48

[shortdesc]

3M Cubitron II Cut-Off Wheel, 66526, T1, black, 5 in x 0.05 in x 7/8 in (12.70 cm x 1.27 mm)

  • The 3M™ Cubitron™ II Cut-Off Wheels with 3M Precision Shaped Grain are engineered to cut faster than competitive ceramic products offering significant productivity gains
  • Metalworking professionals value its fast cutting action on heat-sensitive metals and its abrasive cutting wheel efficiency, yielding 2 to 7x more cuts than conventional cut-off wheels in many cases.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country Poland

    Product Information

  • Outstanding cutting performance on both mild steel and ultra high strength steel
  • 3M™ Cubitron™ II cuts 30% faster and lasts 2x longer than conventional ceramic abrasives
  • Precision Shaped Grain (PSG) technology employs microreplication for extremely uniform abrasive
  • Triangular Precision Shaped Grains are super-sharp and cut exceptionally fast
    		•

entry.title: 3M AB87465 - 3M Silver Cut-Off Wheel, 87465, T1, black, 4 1/2 in x 0.05 in x 7/8 in (11.43 cm x 1.27 mm) AB87465 7100139228
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 2.42

[shortdesc]

3M Silver Cut-Off Wheel, 87465, T1, black, 4 1/2 in x 0.05 in x 7/8 in (11.43 cm x 1.27 mm)

  • The 3M™ Silver Cut-Off Wheel is designed to deliver a combination of performance and value in metal cutting applications
  • This long-lasting wheel uses 3M Precision-Shaped Grain to deliver a fast and consistent cut through pipes, tubes, or flat sheets of stainless steel, mild steel, aerospace alloys, and more.
    • [/shortdesc][additional] DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET [/additional]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country Poland

    Product Information

  • Designed to quickly cut through metal pipes, tubes, flat sheets, and more
  • Abrasive wheel provides exceptional durability extending the life of the wheel for great performance value
  • 3M Precision-Shaped Grain cuts exceptionally fast, helping increase productivity
  • May be used on a variety of substrates such as carbon steel and stainless steel
    		•

entry.summary:
Vendor: JET
Type: Cut-off Wheels
Price: 1.95

[shortdesc]

3 x 1/16 x 3/8 A46T POWER ABRASIVE T1 Cut-Off Wheel

  • Ideal for general purpose cutting of steel materials in a wide variety of automotive and industrial applications
